Genetic data. BIN : BOLD :AAA9761 (n=5 from Ethiopia , n=9 from South Africa , Kenya , Yemen , Oman ; maximum variation 0.7%). Nearest species:
Z. anacantha
(1.1%).
Distribution. Egypt , Eritrea , Ethiopia , Kenya , Oman , Saudi Arabia , Tanzania , Yemen ( Fletcher 1974 ; Herbulot 1977 ; Fletcher 1978 ; Hausmann 2009 ).

Remarks. Male genitalia of Ethiopian populations with comparatively narrow valva (as characteristic for
Z. latilimbata
) but uncus narrow as shown in Aarvik & Bjørnstad (2007) for the new description of
Z. ndogo
. Since the latter was described based on one single male without information on the DNA barcode, nothing is known about variation. DNA barcodes (BOLD:AAA9761) support conspecificity of
Z. latilimbata
populations from both sides of the southern Red Sea. These populations probably do not differ taxonomically from the more northern populations of southernmost Egypt ( type locality) and Eritrea (confirmed by dissection, see above).
